string-array.name: Quote_List
string-array.item: \"Invest in yourself, and the returns will follow.\"
\"Trading is not about being right all the time, it\'s about managing risk and controlling emotions.\"
\"Investing is a marathon, not a sprint. Pace yourself and focus on the long term.\"
\"The best investment you can make is in your own education.\"
\"Don\'t let fear or greed drive your investment decisions. Stay disciplined and stick to your plan.\"
\"In investing, as in life, patience is a virtue.\"
\"Successful investing requires research, discipline, and a long-term outlook.\"
\"The trade market is a device for transferring money from the impatient to the patient.\"
\"Investing is not a get-rich-quick scheme. It\'s a way to build wealth over time.\"
\"The key to successful trading is not predicting the future, but managing risk in the present.\"
\"Jab jeb mei ho Gandhi, Toh chori tumhari pyaar mei aandhi.\"
